text: U nego yest' neotluchnyye sputniki, speredi yego i szadi yego; oni steregut za nim, po veleniyu Boga. Bog ne peremenyayet togo, chto yest' v lyudyakh, pokuda sami oni ne peremenyat togo, chto yest' v nikh: kogda Bog zakhochet sdelat' zlo kakim libo lyudyam, to Yemu net prepony, a dlya nikh, oprich' Yego, net zashchitnika
